es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api

Interface IPatternController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatternController

    public interface IPatternController
    Interface for controller of Pattern. Amcharts use pattern as property in AmGraph or another objects. PatternController manage creation of that property.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
